code: import React from'react';import{useNavigate}from'react-router-dom';import'./Cart.css';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Cart=_ref=>{let{cartItems}=_ref;const navigate=useNavigate();const getTotalPrice=()=>{return cartItems.reduce((total,item)=>total+item.quantity*item.price,0);};const goToCheckout=()=>{navigate('/checkout');};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"Cart",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("table",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("thead",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("tr",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{children:"Product"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{children:"Name"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{children:"Quantity"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{children:"Price"})]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("tbody",{children:cartItems.length===0?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("tr",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{colSpan:"4",children:"Your cart is empty."})}):cartItems.map(item=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("tr",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:item.imageUrl,alt:item.name})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{children:item.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{children:item.quantity}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("td",{children:["$",item.price]})]},item.id))}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("tfoot",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("tr",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{colSpan:"3",children:"Total"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("td",{children:["$",getTotalPrice()]})]})})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:goToCheckout,disabled:cartItems.length===0,children:"Go to Checkout"})]});};export default Cart;
